Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.Controller.MiniController

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    MiniController
    This interface creates every class that allows to parse the input of the user directly on the client, without using the server
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BaseMiniController
    Basic MiniController
    CanEndMiniController
    This MiniController is used when the user can choose to end his phase.
    CheckDomeMiniController
    This MiniController is used when a player has ATLAS as god
    ChosenMiniController
    This MiniController checks the parsing of inputs during the initialization, when the player choose which god he wants to use.
    MoreCheckMiniController
    This MiniController checks if the constructor chosen by the player can use the spacial power of his god
    OrderMiniController
    This MiniController selects the first player to start by parsing the input
    PickGodMiniController
    This MiniController checks the input during the initialization part where the first player chooses 2/3 gods
    ServerMoveMiniController
    This is ServerMoveMiniController
    StandardMiniController
    This MiniController is used for every standard action
